Our Story

Founded in 2018, the Naveen & Nikilesh Group began with a focused vision: land plotting and development. Originally a specialized team dedicated to transforming raw land into organized, well-planned layouts, the group has evolved into a comprehensive construction and development powerhouse.

Over the years, we've successfully completed 25+ land development projects, creating residential plots and commercial spaces that have shaped communities. Our expertise in land surveying, plot layout, infrastructure planning, and regulatory compliance has earned us the trust of clients across the region.

Today, we're expanding our wings beyond land development into full-scale construction. Embracing modern construction techniques and sustainable practices, we're ready to take on projects of any scale while maintaining the core values that have defined us from the beginning: integrity, quality, and customer satisfaction.

- TADI SRINIVAS REDDY

Naveen & Nikilesh Group
